title.rendered: Jumpshare Plus Now Offers 100GB Storage At No Extra Charge

content.rendered:
We’re excited to announce that Jumpshare Plus now offers 100GB storage for the same $9.99/month pricing. Store thousands of photos, HD videos, large documents, spreadsheets, and presentations without running out of space!

All existing Plus users have been upgraded. Now you can share large files with your clients who can instantly preview them online. And by using your domain name and logo, you can look even smarter when sharing files!

Haven’t upgraded yet? Upgrade Now!
